Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at South Shore/71st
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 75th, Coles and 71st due to, street blockage near South Shore/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via South Shore, 75th, Coles and 71st due to, street blockage near South Shore/71st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
